cast.overview: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer trip to Europe. However, they will hardly be able to rest - Peter will have to agree to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of creatures that cause natural disasters and destruction throughout the continent.
cast.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home

details.biography: Charlie Esquér is a British American actress living in London & LA. She was born to a British father and an American mother. On her maternal side her Grandmother is Mexican and Grandfather is Native American Indian. She has trained at Richmond Drama School and RADA before completing her training at Rose Bruford.
details.name: Charlie Esquér
